Body:
doc = make_doc([10, 10, 10, 10, 10, 10, 10], None, [False, True, True, True,
    True, True, False])
filtr = BlockProximityFusion(1, True, False)
is_changed = filtr.process(doc)
block_idxs = [(block.offset_blocks_start, block.offset_blocks_end) for
    block in doc.text_blocks]
assert block_idxs == [(0, 0), (1, 5), (6, 6)]
assert is_changed is True
